items.sentence: How did you know I didn\'t want to go to Boston?
Tom, Mary and John sat around the kitchen table.
Tom, Mary and John shared the cost of the party.
Tom, Mary and a few other people went yesterday.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all like Chinese food.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are in the same class.
Mary doesn\'t wear as much makeup as Alice does.
I wanted Tom put in jail even more than you did.
I was surprised to learn that Tom was a liberal.
I was upset by the news of the traffic accident.
I wish I could figure out how to make Tom happy.
I wish I could speak French half as well as you.
Tom went back into the house to get an umbrella.
Tom has no idea how to answer Mary\'s questions.
You\'re just running away from life\'s problems.
You\'re just the person we\'ve been looking for.
If you\'re going to kill me, I want to know why.
Is something wrong with the way I\'m doing this?
Tom told Mary to buy some coffee and cigarettes.
Tom told Mary where she could buy imported wine.
